headline: Ask HN: Anyone regret getting a (subdermal) microchip implant?
description:
The discussion of chip implants came up yesterday in a subthread in the submission about Flipper Zero (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32166058)

Led me down a bit of a rabbit hole to see what the current status is of chip implants.

Dangerous Things seems to have a bunch of interesting implants of various kinds: https://dangerousthings.com/

There are also companies like VivoKey (https://www.vivokey.com/) and Walletmor (https://walletmor.com/) that does payment implants.

The whole area is still relatively niche though, but what is HN better at than niche interests?

So I'm asking you who either has or had chip implants, do/did you regret doing it? Anything in particular that was unexpected from having the implant?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有谁后悔做了（皮下）微芯片植入？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有誰後悔做了（皮下）微芯片植入？
description_zh-Hans:
昨天，在提交的关于Flipper Zero（https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32166058）的分题中，出现了关于芯片植入的讨论。

让我进入了一个兔子洞，看看芯片植入的现状。

Dangerous Things似乎有一堆有趣的各种植入物：https://dangerousthings。 com/

还有像VivoKey(https://www.vivokey.com/)和Walletmor(https://walletmor.com/)这样的公司在做支付植入。

虽然整个领域仍然比较小众，但HN有什么比小众的兴趣更好呢？

所以我在问那些已经或已经植入芯片的人，你是否后悔做这个？有什么特别的事情是植入芯片后意想不到的吗？
description_zh-Hant:
昨天，在提交的關於Flipper Zero（https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32166058）的分題中，出現了關於芯片植入的討論。

讓我進入了一個兔子洞，看看芯片植入的現狀。

Dangerous Things似乎有一堆有趣的各種植入物：https://dangerousthings。 com/

還有像VivoKey(https://www.vivokey.com/)和Walletmor(https://walletmor.com/)這樣的公司在做支付植入。

雖然整個領域仍然比較小眾，但HN有什麼比小眾的興趣更好呢？

所以我在問那些已經或已經植入芯片的人，你是否後悔做這個？有什麼特別的事情是植入芯片後意想不到的嗎？
